update.reportxiaofei:
START TRANSACTION;\\ DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `msgtemp`;\\ CREATE TABLE `msgtemp` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `content` varchar(200) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1; \\ DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `msg`;\\ CREATE TABLE `msg` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `content` varchar(200) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1; \\
COMMIT;\\
